items.name: BIOMUTANT Wiki
items.title: BIOMUTANT Wiki
items.desc: Biomutant is an action role playing game by Experiment 101 and THQ Nordic. You control a raccoon in a world of mutated animals, and play a major part in the unfolding of a story where a plague is ruining the New World and the Tree-of-Life is bleeding death from its roots. The Tribes stand divided, in need of someone strong enough to unite them or bring them all down. You are also guided through the world by a Storyteller that narrates every step of your journey.
